name: OMG, The Ground Is Falling!
description:
OMG, The Ground Is Falling! is a very simple game - every block that you step on falls. You have to use the falling blocks and your wits in order to defeat every enemy in each stage in order to advance to the next one.

FEATURES (on current version):

-50 stages

-7 playable characters

-Full soundtrack with 12 songs

-Full-fledged map editor - you can make your own map packs

-Challenging, fast-paced platforming action

Game's Facebook page --> https://www.facebook.com/omgtgif

Soundtrack on Bandcamp --> https://augustoad.bandcamp.com/releases

--

The game has been released the 18th of June of 2015.

email me at augustoaguieiras@hotmail.com if you want to ask anything. :)
